name: CLI System Dump Utility for Windows
short_description:
The Sentry Utilities CLI System Dump Utility provides an easy way to access all of a system's most important statistics directly from Windows' Command Line Interpreter (CMD.EXE). And the best part is, as it goes along, the SDU creates a range of files to record its findings for later viewing and use.

Why choose the CLI SDU?

The CLI SDU puts all the information you need right at your fingertips - all you have to do is open up a Command Prompt window, type "dump," and it starts! Because the CLI SDU relies entirely on batch scripts, it's much faster than other dump utilities, and its system of creating a file for everything it finds makes finding what you need to know a breeze - no more slogging through a massive dump file just to view your computer's directory tree(s). The SDU is quick, robust, and simple.
summary: A utility which provides a detailed set of system stats from CMD.EXE.
